name: SELFS
description:
Sometimes, the thin line between a dream and reality can be drawn with a ray of light. You play as an elf puppet and its shadow (at the same time), and you're helping them to escape a life they never chose! 

"I have lived my entire life on a dusty shelf. My only friend was my shadow, created by my maker's, old lamps' light. I tried to get used to it, like any other toy, but everyday feels like an eternity and I CAN'T TAKE IT ANYMORE. Today, I'll end this. but not alone. My shadow will help me..."   - The Elf Puppet

Instructions - Controls
  • Use the puppet to move the light bulbs and generate shadows from the shelves which will let the shadow reach the top.
  • Use the shadow to activate the Jack in the Box toy and rifle the puppet towards the higher shelves. 
  • Movement: WASD, Arrows
  • Jump/Interactions: Space
  • Change Character: Shift
Features
  • Original Artwork
  • Original Music
  • A Really Surreal Scenario 
  • 2 Great Characters
  • One More Brain Teaser Experience
Credits
  • Concept: Demberg
  • Programmer: Giorgos Pagalis
  • Art/Animation: Rea Papadopetrou
  • Sound Design/Music: Denia Palaiologou
